Summary: large quiet circle shaped ufo with flashing lights in all colors of the rainbow hovered for a few hours and acended into the sky.
Object Shape: Cigar, Circle, Diamond, Fireball, Sphere, Star-like
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Junction City
There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around January 8th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsid been seeing the ufos for the past few months now. i had a feeling lastnight to look. usualy they come around midnight but last night it was 8pm and id never seen them that low befor. there were several of them in the sky but 2 were closest to the ground. they were hovering and were very bright. like circles with flashing lights in all different colors of the rainbow. they stayed for a few hours befor raising into the sky, they were quiet. the other was a cigar shaped and it was yellow, id never seen that 1 befor. and i recorded them on video camera. i plan to continue documenting them. since this happends alot now ive noticed a pattern. they leave when the helicopters come and the next day the helicopters stay circling in the same area the ufos were that night.
